title: Is there strictness in attendance criteria in PGDAV College? - Quora
tags: Pannalal Girdharlal Dayanand Anglo Vedic, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: There wasn’t any strictness last year but the college has made us signed the undertaking this year. The undertaking states that any student having attendance less than 67% will be detained. Now, this is the first time PGDAV has taken such a step. Let’s see how effective this will be and let’s hope for the best.
